page.title: 14An ordinary day in my life
page.content: I get to school at{8:40 a.m.}and play football with my friends before the bell goes at{8:55 a.m.} We line up outside the classroom and are let in at{9:00 a.m.}After registration we read for a while before assembly and then usually do maths until playtime at {10:40 a.m.}when we play cricket or football. After some language work like writing a story, the bell goes at {12:00 p.m.}I have my lunch at {12:40 {p.m.}I bring sandwiches. School finishes at{3:30 p.m.}and when I get home, I usually watch Children's ITV, play on my computer or go out to play. Tea is about{5:30 p.m.}We usually have a roast or salad but we might have a Bar-B-Q. After that, I might go out and play or put the T.V. or Video on. Before I go to bed, I write what has happened in my diary.
